name: David Gallo
biography:
Born in 1966.
Lives and works as stage designer in New York City.
Major works include his designes for "Jackie: An American Life" in 1997, "Theatre of Blood", "You're a Good Man, Charley Brown" in 1999, "Jitney" in 1998, "A View from the Bridge" in 1998, and "The Lion in Winter" in 1999.
